title: RStudio distill
description: A fresh start using RStudio's latest web format
contents:
Rstudio just announced the CRAN release of distill, an R package for formatting scientific and technical websites. Like all RStudio tools, distill is super easy to use. It took only a few minutes to convert my old portfolio into a nicer-looking personal website.
The release of distill is timely. After a challenging 2020, it is nice to have a little nudge to refresh and regroup for 2021.
For me personally, this is the right time to rebuild my website. It has been four years since I started my career, and I now have a better understanding of how I fit into my professional community.

title: Targetopia
description: An R package ecosystem for reproducible computation at scale
